Check if there are views without properties in physical data model (#1259)

# Description

Improving validation of physical data model by adding new validator
which checks if physical data model contains views which have no
explicit properties neither implements views that have properties.

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Improved

- Validation of physical data model which now captures if data model
contains "undefined" views, i.e. views which have no explicit or
inherited properties
